description: This file is a shell script used for managing Google Test (gtest) application downloads, cleanup, and logging within a build or deployment environment. It handles tasks such as downloading specified gtest applications, cleaning applications, and logging actions to a log file.

methods.name: echo_t
methods.description: Logs a timestamped message to standard output, used within this script.

methods.name: clean_gtest_app
methods.description: Removes mounted directories and deletes files related to a specified gtest application component.

methods.name: download_all_gtest_apps
methods.description: Parses the manifest JSON file to download all gtest applications listed.
